document.full_text: bahrain warned its nationals on tuesday not to travel to lebanon for their own safety, after iranian-backed shi'ite muslim group hezbollah came out in support of weeks of protests by mainly shi'ite demonstrators.
document.title: bahrain bans lebanon travel, sectarian tension rises
lines_and_colors: bahrain warned its nationals on tuesday not to travel to lebanon for their own safety, after iranian-backed shi'ite muslim group hezbollah came out in support of weeks of protests by mainly shi'ite demonstrators.
